00077 #ifndef B_NO_INTRINSICS
00078 #include <intrin.h>
00079 #pragma intrinsic( _InterlockedExchange, _InterlockedCompareExchange, _InterlockedDecrement, _InterlockedIncrement )
00080 #endif
00081 
00082 # ifdef _FS_P32
00083 
00084 #ifndef B_NO_INTRINSICS
00085 inline int _FS_Swap( volatile int* gate, int value )
00086 {
00087         return ( int )_InterlockedExchange( ( volatile long* )gate, ( long )value );
00088 }
00089 
00090 inline int _FS_CompareAndSwap( volatile int* gate, int value, int compare )
00091 {
00092         return ( int )_InterlockedCompareExchange( ( volatile long* )gate, ( long )value, ( long )compare );
00093 }
00094 
00095 inline int _FS_Decrement( volatile int* lock )
00096 {
00097         return ( int )_InterlockedDecrement( ( volatile long* )lock );
00098 }
00099 
00100 inline int _FS_Increment( volatile int* lock )
00101 {
00102         return ( int )_InterlockedIncrement( ( volatile long* )lock );
00103 }
00104 
00105 inline void _FS_Pause()
00106 {
00107         __asm pause;
00108 }
00109 #else
00110 inline int _FS_Swap( volatile int* gate, int value ) { return 0; }
00111 inline int _FS_CompareAndSwap( volatile int* gate, int value, int compare ) { return 0; }
00112 inline int _FS_Decrement( volatile int* lock ) { return 0; }
00113 inline int _FS_Increment( volatile int* lock ) { return 0; }
00114 inline void _FS_Pause() { }
00115 #endif

00119         return _aligned_malloc( size, alignmentPow2 );
